DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether novel aspiration thrombectomy device combine catheter-directed thrombolysis effective treatment acute iliofemoral deep venous thrombosis ( IF-DVT ) .
DOC.brief_title: Study Novel Thrombectomy Device Treat Acute Iliofemoral Deep Venous Thrombosis
DOC.detailed_description: Catheter-directed thrombolysis perform eligible patient acute IF-DVT . A combined mechanical thrombectomy use clear iliac thrombus experimental group . The immediate , mid- long-term outcome record . Quantitative data wiil express mean Â± SD , compare independent-sample t-test paired-sample t-test . Count data express ratio ( percentage ) , chi-square test fisher 's exact test use comparison . A difference P < 0.05 consider statistically significant . All statistical analysis perform use IBM SPSS , version 22.0 ( SPSS Inc. , Chicago , IL , USA ) .
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis iliofemoral deep venous thrombosis Symptoms le 14 day ' duration With good function status A life expectancy 1 year A low risk bleed Without iliac vein thrombosis Anticoagulation and/or thrombolysis contraindication Systemic infection Heart , hepatic , renal function insufficiency
